Name: Foul Tonic
Description: Target gets Envenomed 10. If it's an Ally, it also gets Buffed +20.

Name: Health Potion
Description: Two Allies get Restored and Healed 40.

Name: Eye of Horus
Description: Gain Hexproof (cannot be targeted by spells or abilities).

Name: Monke Juice
Description: Deal 20 damage to a Character and give it +20 Attack. If it's a Monkey, only give it +30 Attack instead.

Name: Papyrus of Imhotep
Description: Copy a random Item or Spell from your deck and play it.
